title: Ultimate Bravery - New Game mode?

embed.description: Play Ultimate Bravery in the new Season 7. All champions and items are up to date. Ultimate Bravery is a fun gamemode for League of Legends.

body:
Hey everyone,

I have only just learned of this fun little site and way to play the game. 

Would anyone like to give it a go with me? Seems like it could be a good way to spice the game up a bit.

Add me by IGN or just say if interested to see i we get numbers

replies.body: i knew about ultimate bravery for a while, but kept forgetting to play it, getting an organised club to ultimate bravery would be nice, add me ign and make the ultimate bravery club, we can play games when we are both online, and hopefullyplaying will make more ppl wanna play it
